description: An example schema that uses the AI extension to automatically generate embedding vectors for a type
Example Python code that uses Gel AI Python binding to perform similarity search for a text query
code:
import gel
import gel.ai

gel_client = gel.create_client()
gel_ai = gel.ai.create_rag_client(client, model="gpt-4o-mini")  # need to specify model even when now using it

text = "test query"
vector = gel_ai.generate_embeddings(
    text,
    model="text-embedding-3-small",
)

gel_client.query(
    "select ext::ai::search(Type1, <array<float32>>$embedding_vector",
    embedding_vector=vector,
)
